bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for High-Voltage Switchgear (Above 1000 V) Test Techniques--Partial Discharge Measurements
IEEE Standard for High-Voltage Switchgear (Above 1000 V) Test Techniques--Partial Discharge Measurements

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard adopts IEC 60270:2000 and defines methods of measuring partial discharges that may occur in energized power switchgear apparatus, in flaws, voids, and interfaces of non-self restoring insulation that may lead to dielectric failure of the switchgear.

This standard adopts IEC 60270:2000 and defines methods of measuring partial discharges that may occur in energized power switchgear apparatus, in flaws, voids, and interfaces of non-self restoring insulation that may lead to dielectric failure of the switchgear.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
